documentation.text: @notice Update the uri of tokens metadatas
@notice Pause the contract in case of problems
@notice Burn a token with its id and decrease the total supply
@notice Transfer a token from one address to another using the token id

@notice modify the address of the delegation contract to allow the said contract to interact with this one
@param _address address of proxy contract

params.key: key index of parameter you want to return

params.params256: array uint256 used for complex parameter

params.key: key index of parameter you want to return

params.owner: sender of tx origin by proxyContract
params.tokenId: id of token you want to update
params.tokenTemp: structure of token you want to return

burn(uint256).notice: Burn a token with its id and decrease the total supply

getAllTokensForUser(address).notice: Retrieve in a table all the ids token of a user

getParamsContract(string).notice: Retrieve one of the contract data using the key

getTokenDetails(uint256).notice: Retrieve data from a token using its id

pause(bool).notice: Pause the contract in case of problems

setAddressProxyContract(address).notice: modify the address of the delegation contract to allow the said contract to interact with this one

setBaseURI(string).notice: Update the uri of tokens metadatas

setParamsContract(string,uint256).notice: Update one of the cotnrat data using the key

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer a token from one address to another using the token id

updateToken((uint8[],uint256[]),uint256,.notice: Update the token (hero) in case of level up for example by using the id as key and sending directly the object of the token update
